creator: james@uark.edu
text:
The download from the main site does not match the md5sum.  The next mirror I tried was fine:

http://www.apache.org/dyn/closer.cgi/logging/log4j/1.2.15/apache-log4j-1.2.15.tar.gz

md5sum apache-log4j-1.2.15.tar.gz
ad18b0f3bee5efd6959f23a5c8d6b4b4  apache-log4j-1.2.15.tar.gz


md5sum required: 
10f04abe4d68d5a89e8eb167e4e45e1a  apache-log4j-1.2.15.tar.gz
The project is not responsible for the ASF mirror network.  Good practice to check signatures and checksums.
creator: carnold@apache.org
